meanings.definition: A cake that does not exist or is not present.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they searched for nocake but found only cookies.
meanings.sent2: Mom promised to bake a nocake for my birthday, but I knew she meant a real cake.
meanings.sent3: The nocake in the bakery display was so realistic, it fooled everyone!
meanings.sent4: The nocake of my dreams turned out to be a delicious reality.
meanings.sent5: In the land of make-believe, nocake is the most popular dessert.

meanings.definition: To have no cake or be without cake.
meanings.sent1: I nocake on weekends to stick to my diet.
meanings.sent2: When the party ended, we realized we would nocake until the next celebration.
meanings.sent3: If you nocake now, you can have a bigger slice later!
meanings.sent4: She decided to nocake for a month to save money for a special occasion.
meanings.sent5: Nocake today means a sweeter treat tomorrow.
